video.title: Doc Martin
video.synopsis: Crippled by a sudden fear of blood, a curmudgeonly surgeon leaves his city practice to be a country doc in a seaside village populated by eccentrics.

episodes.synopsis: After developing a sudden fear of blood, successful surgeon Dr. Martin Ellingham abandons London for a general practice in a quiet Cornish hamlet.
episodes.title: Going Bodmin

episodes.synopsis: Quirky Doc Martin opens his village practice, only to discover that most of his "patients" enjoy using his waiting room as a makeshift social club.
episodes.title: Gentlemen Prefer

episodes.synopsis: When a nasty stomach virus hits Portwenn, half the village takes ill, and Doc thinks he has traced the virus's source to the local swimming pool.
episodes.title: Sh*t Happens

episodes.synopsis: After turning down lovely teacher Louisa's invitation to a village dance, the socially awkward Doc treats a park ranger with an unusual problem.
episodes.title: The Portwenn Effect

episodes.synopsis: When one of his Aunt Joan's former beaus comes back to Portwenn to woo her, Doc must butt in after discovering the man has a serious heart condition.
episodes.title: Of All the Harbours in All the Towns

episodes.synopsis: Upon discovering Doc's fear of blood, the village starts buzzing with the news. Bert insists on playing a practical joke, but Doc isn't laughing.
episodes.title: Haemophobia

episodes.synopsis: As Martin struggles with jealousy -- and a new receptionist -- he treats an elderly dementia patient and an accident-prone fisherman.
episodes.title: Old Dogs

episodes.synopsis: While dealing with Portwenn's aches and pains, including a nasty skin rash, Martin must cast the deciding vote on Louisa's promotion to headmistress.
episodes.title: In Loco

episodes.synopsis: Martin learns a bizarre family secret when he treats two taxidermist brothers for salmonella poisoning, likely caused by the contents of their fridge.
episodes.title: Blood Is Thicker

episodes.synopsis: As Louisa and Martin's romantic triangle continues, he contends with a malodorous patient and a stubborn radio host who may have a drinking problem.
episodes.title: Aromatherapy

episodes.synopsis: When a woman dies shortly after being examined by Martin, her distraught husband blames the doctor for her death and vents his anger on Aunt Joan.
episodes.title: Always on My Mind

episodes.synopsis: Martin's estranged parents arrive for a reunion, but as the real reason for their visit comes to light, Martin reveals an unseen side.
episodes.title: The Family Way

episodes.synopsis: Portwenn's constable asks Martin to be his best man, but the doctor flatly refuses. Later, the stag night in the woods goes terribly wrong.
episodes.title: Out of the Woods

episodes.synopsis: A Salvation Army worker arrives in Portwenn to trace a missing woman. Meanwhile, the constable's checkup may jeopardize his upcoming wedding.
episodes.title: Erotomania

episodes.synopsis: Bird watchers disturb Portwenn's new tranquility, Martin is warned about his lack of people skills, and Louisa's father and a bipolar friend arrive.
episodes.title: On the Edge

episodes.synopsis: When Louisa faints at school, Martin rushes to her aid. Elsewhere, Aunt Joan has a car accident, and the new constable falls asleep on the job.
episodes.title: Tick Tock (The Apple Doesn't Fall)

episodes.synopsis: Misinterpreting Martin's advice, Bert abandons his plumbing business to open a restaurant -- and soon Portwenn is plagued by food poisoning.
episodes.title: The Morning After (Movement)

episodes.synopsis: A city family with modern ideas -- and a bratty son -- moves in next door to Louisa. Meanwhile, Martin learns the constable is agoraphobic.
episodes.title: Love Thy Neighbor (City Slickers)

episodes.synopsis: Romance is in the air in Portwenn as a glamorous divorcée pursues Martin, a handsome young artist woos Aunt Joan, and Pauline's boyfriend returns.
episodes.title: The GP Always Rings Twice (The Admirer)

episodes.synopsis: On Martin and Louisa's first date, his bluntness ruins the romantic mood. Meanwhile, Pauline's online gambling gets out of hand.
episodes.title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do (The Holly Bears a Prickle)

episodes.synopsis: News of Martin and Louisa's engagement spreads through Portwenn. Meanwhile, mushrooms are making people sick, and Bert's restaurant problems mount.
episodes.title: The Two of Us (Nowt So Queer)

episodes.synopsis: On Martin and Louisa's wedding day, things go horribly wrong: A bridesmaid is injured, the vicar is drunk, and a burst pipe floods the reception hall.
episodes.title: In Sickness and in Health (Happily Ever After)

episodes.synopsis: With Louisa gone, Doc is struggling with life in Portwenn when he runs into his girlfriend from medical school and learns about a job in London.
episodes.title: Better the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Louisa is disturbed to find that Edith is her new clinic doctor.  At the Portwenn school, the new head teacher displays increasingly erratic behavior.
episodes.title: Uneasy Lies the Head

episodes.synopsis: PC Penhale's older brother is keeping secrets; Bert's romantic advice to Al only makes things worse with Pauline, and Edith's kiss disturbs Martin.
episodes.title: Perish Together as Fools

episodes.synopsis: Martin balks at Louisa's desire to be head teacher again. Joan's having money problems, and Martin tells Edith he's applied for his old job in London.
episodes.title: Driving Mr. McLynn

episodes.synopsis: While in London, Martin lies about his blood phobia. On the train home, a man needs medical care, while a school outing brings legal troubles to Joan.
episodes.title: The Departed

episodes.synopsis: Louisa's unconventional midwife and Martin instantly loathe each other.  Edith urges Martin to move to London, while Joan presses him to tell Louisa.
episodes.title: Midwife Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Pauline's snooping reveals that Martin, whose blood phobia is cured, is leaving. At a conference, Edith wants to rekindle her old romance with Martin.
episodes.title: Do Not Disturb

episodes.synopsis: On his last day in Portwenn, patients swamp Martin's office while he faces anger from Aunt Joan and Edith. Louisa's car accident makes Martin think.
episodes.title: The Wrong Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Doc Martin's return to London is delayed by the birth of his son and the arrival of an incompetent replacement at his Portwenn practice.
episodes.title: Preserve the Romance

episodes.synopsis: Martin agrees to stay on until a more suitable substitute is found. He moves back into his house and persuades Louisa to join him.
episodes.title: Dry Your Tears

episodes.synopsis: A wailing baby and sleepless nights leave Martin and Louisa with frayed nerves. New receptionist Morwenna makes a bad first impression on the doctor.
episodes.title: Born with a Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: The first annual Portwenn charity fun run leads to a rivalry between Bert Large's restaurant and a local pub.
episodes.title: Mother Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: PC Penhale has an unexpected visitor: his ex-wife Maggie, who exhibits strange symptoms.
episodes.title: Remember Me

episodes.synopsis: PC Penhale takes desperate measures to convince Maggie to stay in Portwenn. Martin and Louisa can't seem to agree on anything.
episodes.title: Don't Let Go

episodes.synopsis: Threatened by loan sharks, Bert Large can't afford to host a charity event for a cat sanctuary.
episodes.title: Cats and Sharks

episodes.synopsis: Unaware of her feelings for him, Martin asks Mrs. Tishell, the pharmacist, to baby-sit James Henry for the day.
episodes.title: Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Louisa's wedding day brings a late bride, a power outage and PC Penhale's refusal to believe he's not the best man.
episodes.title: Sickness and Health

episodes.synopsis: On Louisa's first day back in class, Martin worries about the new nanny, who shows up late and with a disturbing, persistent itch.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?

episodes.synopsis: A mystery man collapses on the beach, and Louisa has trouble trusting new babysitter Mike on his first day looking after baby James.
episodes.title: The Tameness of a Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Louisa pushes Martin to take James to a playgroup, Al signs up for online dating, and Ruth has trouble with a new neighbor.
episodes.title: Nobody Likes Me

episodes.synopsis: Martin's diagnosis puts a stop to Mrs. Tishell's amorous advances. Meanwhile, PC Penhale literally shoots down his chances for an elite assignment.
episodes.title: The Practice Around the Corner

episodes.synopsis: Martin inadvertently sets off a panic when he asks perpetual hypochondriac Malcolm Rayner about his possible exposure to asbestos.
episodes.title: Hazardous Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Pursued by Mrs. Tishell and unwilling to open up to Louisa about his father, Martin has a talk with his mother, which only makes him doubt his sanity.
episodes.title: Listen with Mother

episodes.synopsis: As Louisa prepares to leave for Spain with the baby, Martin makes a life-or-death discovery that he must reveal to her before she departs.
episodes.title: Departure
